channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Iran has amassed even more near weapons-grade uranium, UN watchdog says
item.description: The report by the International Atomic Energy Agency says that as of May 17, Iran has amassed 900.8 pounds of uranium enriched up to 60%.

item.title: Why Agile Teams Are Winning the Race to Create AI-Ready Cultures
